name: Goose with a Gun
description:
A short little game about a goose who's looking to prove who's the boss of the local park. It might be tricky, there's plenty of competition. Perhaps you have better odds now that you've found a gun?

Take on the other animals of the park, and make your way through a random assortment of levels! Find and buy items along the way... and shoot dangerous frogs! Reach level 10 and prove that you're the worst goose around!

A game inspired by Risk of Rain, made in about 20 days as part of a school project. Made in Unity with little to no prior knowledge of the engine. As the school project ends with this release, we'll see if I continue work here afterwards. Feedback is much appreciated!

Development

Curious about the game's development? I've got a public Trello board that I used throughout the project, along with a day-by-day progress log. Check it out!
https://trello.com/b/VJdalSoy/project-goose-with-a-gun

Credits

Music and some sound effects are made by Andrey Sitkov and CactusBear respectively. They are used as part of the following licenses:
https://static.gamedevmarket.net/terms-conditions/#pro-licence
https://support.humblebundle.com/hc/en-us/articles/1260802247230

Colors chosen were based off of this palette by Gabriel C.
